GenericProperty.Name: Tags
GenericProperty.Description: Associate the story with one or more Vod Pro tags to have it appear on a sub-section listing

GenericProperty.Name: Mini-Teaser
GenericProperty.Description: You have 140 characters to play with

GenericProperty.Name: Featured Jobs
GenericProperty.Description: Jobs that appear on the Right-hand side of every page

GenericProperty.Name: Tags
GenericProperty.Description: Associate the story with one or more Vod Pro tags to have it appear on a sub-section listing

GenericProperty.Name: Mini-Teaser
GenericProperty.Description: You have 140 characters to play with

GenericProperty.Name: Hide Sponsors?
GenericProperty.Description: Check this box to hide the Sponsors from the RH column

GenericProperty.Name: Requires Login
GenericProperty.Description: Check this if you want the Story content below to be behind the RegWall

GenericProperty.Name: Member-only Story
GenericProperty.Description: Usually premium content, but check the Requires login box above
